text: ohuma sūyadæyā (dīptimat ālōkayak vaśayenda, candrayā (alaṁkāravat) ālōkaya labā dennak bavaṭada pat kara avurudu saṁkhyāvada, (māsayanhi) gaṇanayada oba dæna gænīma piṇisa, (candrayā vana) eyaṭa (māruven māruvaṭa pæmiṇiya hæki) avasthāvanda manakkalpita kaḷēya. satyaya vū (niyamita) kāraṇāvak nomætiva mēvā allāh utpādanaya kaḷē næta. dæna gata hæki janatāva venuven (tama balasampannakamaṭa ayat) sādhakayan (mesē) vivaraṇaya karannēya
